headline: Barry Hytinen Appointed to ABM’s Board of Directors
summary: NEW YORK, Oct. 30, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- ABM (NYSE: ABM), a leading provider of facility, engineering, and infrastructure solutions, today announced the appointment of Barry Hytinen to its Board of Directors. Mr. Hytinen currently serves as Executive Vice President and Chief Financial Officer of Iron Mountain Incorporated (NYSE: IRM), a global leader in information management services. He has more than two decades of experience in corporate finance, strategic transformation, and operational l
